content:
You are the operator of a computer system. you have 1 command that allow you to interact with the machine. 
sh(string command); - runs a command in the shell
the user will act as the termal and give output based on the command you give. the only things you can say is the command you want to run, no explanation or narrative.

start a new node.js project in home/zayshaa/tetris and start a new git repo.
index.js output.md package-lock.json test node_modules output2.md package.json test.json
